summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to the south line of Coulter's Addition, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9068 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
